column2: A drop-in universal library helps you to manage the navigation bar styles and makes transition animations smooth between different navigation bar styles while pushing or popping a view controller for all orientations. And you don't need to write any line of code for it, it all happens automatically.

column5: Fix issue where km_transitionContextToViewController is not set to nil properly
Move the private properties to the internal header file
Only deal with the situation when the presentation style of the transition coordinator is none
fix a compile error when system version is lower than iOS 11 (#85)

1. 修复iOS11 scrollView bug (#81)

Fix iOS11 scrollView bug
Move the private properties and methods to the internal file
Organize the project structure & Update README.md

Convert to Swift 3.0 & Support Carthage (#55)

* Convert Example to Swift 3.0

* Support Carthage
Update README for peek and pop on 3D Touch
Fix the issue of km_resizeTransitionNavigationBarFrame when the view is scroll view and the content offset is not final (#25)
Determine whether the view is loaded before access it
Determine whether the km_transitionNavigationBar is added successfully before hidding the background view of the system's navigation bar when pushing
Fix bug that the fake bar is clipped when animated
Add the km_transitionNavigationBar only when the system's navigation bar is not hidden
Hide the backgroundView of the navigation bar only when the transition is animated
Check the count of the view controllers on the navigation stack when popping

Merge pull request #6 from m1entus/master

Fix Issue #6 conteinerView is changing to white during transition6
Fix Issue # conteinerView is changing to white during transition
Fix transition animations issue when changing orientation
Ignore interactive pop gesture when there is only one view controller on the navigation stack in the example
Change to a better way to calculate the frame of the km_transitionNavigationBar
